front.title: Test Vectors for Session Traversal Utilities for NAT (STUN)

abstract.t: The Session Traversal Utilities for NAT (STUN) protocol defines several STUN attributes. The content of some of these -- FINGERPRINT, MESSAGE-INTEGRITY, and XOR-MAPPED-ADDRESS -- involve binary-logical operations (hashing, xor). This document provides test vectors for those attributes. This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
